Iker Diaz

About me

Hi there! I'm Iker, a web dev born in Spain and living in the US. I have always been passionate about technology, but it wasn't until I started coding that I developed a real joy for breaking stuff trying to solve a problem. Creating new experiences, implementing eye pleasing designs and making them come to life with animation is what I do best. I just code for fun and hope that someday I can live from doing it. In the meanwhile, I just enjoy the journey!

My work

Battleship

A classic battleship game with options to play against the computer or against other person in the same device.

Funcard

Website for the funcard company, simple, nice and appealing to the eye.
You may need to know spanish to appreciate it though

Restaurant page

A cosmic restaurant page! Customized for chef Zorg's taste.

To-do list

A nice and simple to-do list app, so that no one forget their homework ever again

Weather App

Your go-to when you are not sure if you should take an umbrella with you

Admin dashboard

A simple admin dashboard with the best exercises to get jacked and sexy
